author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
It’s unclear who invited the woke female priest who identifies as “two spirit” with “him/him” pronouns to the cookout, but “he/him” really needs to get off our grill.

A woke female priest, who also claims to be “a white red Native American person,” has announced to the world that White people need to stop trying to fit in because of racism or indigenous rights or something like that.

Female priest who identities as ‘two spirit’ using He/Him pronouns sends message to White People.

“Dear white people, stop trying to get invited to the cookout.

Hi, I’m a white red Native American person and it’s m*rdered and missing indigenous people day.” pic.twitter.com/c6pe3B0YpI
— Oli London (@OliLondonTV)
title: Two-spirit "priest" has hissy fit over white people trying to get invited to the cookout

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
There is zero justification to allow men to compete against women, “and if anybody has a problem with that, they are going to have to get over it,” according to Charles Barkley.

Barkley said what needed to be said, which is that you can respect all people without destroying the integrity of athletic competition.

“I do not under any circumstances, zero, think that men should play sports against women...I’m done. I don’t wanna hear you try to explain it to me.”

Charles Barkley had some STRONG words for people who think that MEN playing in WOMENS sports is ok 🔥 pic.twitter.com/jnQ0y1FIXY
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok) May 9, 2025<
title: "I think they're stupid": Charles Barkley tackles woke obsession with forcing women to compete against men as only he can

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
The goal of the government should always be to represent its people, not foreign nationals. However, that is not the case when it comes to many left-leaning nations, including our most northern neighbors. That is why it would not be surprising if the Canadian government started offering kickbacks for hiring migrant workers over Canadian citizens, which one business owner claims to already be true.

Canadian business owner says the Government offers him incentives to hire migrant workers over Canadians.

“I hire you, you’re from India… basically what happens is I pay $20 bucks per hour- the government every 3 months gives me a 30% kickback.”

pic.twitter.com/NSmYkxOxcD
— Oli London (@OliLondonTV)
title: Canadian business owner claims government is offering them money if they hire migrants over actual Canadians
